alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 5:07PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Androscoggin, southeastern Cumberland and central Sagadahoc Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 506 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gray, or 9 miles north of Westbrook, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Portland, Auburn, Brunswick, Westbrook, Bath, Topsham, Cumberland, Falmouth, Freeport, Gray, Yarmouth, Woolwich, Raymond, Standish, Lisbon, Harpswell, Durham, Bowdoinham, Arowsic, and Chebeague Island. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 between mile markers 7 and 34. Interstate 95 between mile markers 51 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Sagadahoc
